org.openimaj.stream.provider.twitter

Class TwitterStreamDataset

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.util.stream.AbstractStream<T>
      • org.openimaj.util.stream.BlockingDroppingBufferedStream<T>
        • org.openimaj.stream.provider.twitter.AbstractTwitterStreamDataset<twitter4j.Status>
          • org.openimaj.stream.provider.twitter.TwitterStreamDataset
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Iterable<twitter4j.Status>, Iterator<twitter4j.Status>, Dataset<twitter4j.Status>, StreamingDataset<twitter4j.Status>, Stream<twitter4j.Status>

    public class TwitterStreamDataset
extends AbstractTwitterStreamDataset<twitter4j.Status>
    A concrete version of the AbstractTwitterStreamDataset which pushes the Statuss into the stream.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Constructor Detail

      • TwitterStreamDataset

        public TwitterStreamDataset(TwitterAPIToken token)
        Construct the dataset from the given API token. The stream is backed by an ArrayBlockingDroppingQueue with a single item capacity.
        Parameters:
        token - the Twitter api authentication credentials

      • TwitterStreamDataset

        public TwitterStreamDataset(TwitterAPIToken token,
                            BlockingDroppingQueue<twitter4j.Status> buffer)
        Construct the dataset from the given API token and buffer.
        Parameters:
        token - the Twitter api authentication credentials
        buffer - the buffer to hold Statuss before they are consumed.
